title: Table of Contents Block Theme Configuration
description: Complete theme and appearance configuration for Table of Contents blocks

_IMPORTANT_README.title: ⚠️ CENTRALIZED CONFIG SYSTEM - READ BEFORE EDITING
_IMPORTANT_README.description: Units, min, max, and step values are centralized. DO NOT hardcode them in this schema!
rules: ✅ DO: Specify 'cssProperty' - units/min/max/step come from centralizer automatically
❌ DON'T: Add 'units', 'min', 'max', 'step' to SliderWithInput attributes (unless overriding)
✅ DO: Only define 'default' value in schema
✅ DO: Add new CSS properties to centralizer if needed

linkFontSize.comment: ❌ WRONG! These should come from centralizer, not hardcoded here

_IMPORTANT_README.override_when_needed: You CAN override centralizer values if this specific attribute needs different ranges, but document why in a comment

centralizer_lookup.font-size: Units: [rem, px, %, em] | Range varies per unit
centralizer_lookup.letter-spacing: Units: [em, px, rem] | Range varies per unit
centralizer_lookup.padding: Units: [rem, px, %, em, vw, vh] | Range varies per unit
centralizer_lookup.margin: Units: [rem, px, %, em, vw, vh] | Range: -20rem to 20rem (px: -128 to 128)
centralizer_lookup.top/left/right/bottom: Units: [px, %, rem, em, vh] | Range: -200px to 200px (or equivalent)

_IMPORTANT_README.see_also: docs/CONTROL_DATA_STRUCTURES.md for control data format patterns

manualSyncRequired.description: CSS properties are auto-generated from cssVar/cssSelector/cssProperty fields
manualSyncRequired.instructions: CSS variable declarations are automatically generated. Only edit style.scss for structural/layout CSS. To add CSS variables, add cssVar, cssSelector, and cssProperty to schema attributes.
